sentences.en: And she said, Let me glean and gather after the reapers among the sheaves.
sentences.cn: 7她说, 请你让我在收割的人身后,拾取打捆剩下的麦穗.

sentences.en: At present we're gleaning information from all sources.
sentences.cn: 目前我们正从所有渠道慢慢收集信息。

sentences.en: From what I was able to glean appears they don't to take any action yet.
sentences.cn: 根据我所收集到的资料分析他们看来还不打算采取任何行动.

sentences.en: From what I was able to glean, it appears they don't intend to take any action yet.
sentences.cn: 根据我所收集到的资料分析, 他们看来还不打算采取任何行动.

sentences.en: I could not glean what she really want to do.
sentences.cn: 我弄不清楚她究竟想做什么.

sentences.en: NIV They gather fodder in the fields and glean in the vineyards of the wicked.
sentences.cn: 6[和合]收割别人田间的禾稼;摘取恶人余剩的葡萄.

sentences.en: Since then forensic scientists have gained better tools to glean even more information from tiny clues.
sentences.cn: 从此,法医科学家得到更好的工具从细小的线索中收集更多的信息.

sentences.en: So she went out and began to glean in the fields behind the harvesters.
sentences.cn: 3路得就去了,来到田间,在收割的人身后拾取麦穗.

sentences.en: Some children helped them glean in the fields.
sentences.cn: 一些孩子帮他们在田里拾落穗.

sentences.en: Teri's suspicion passes quickly as she tries to glean information about Jack and Kimberly wellbeing.
sentences.cn: 泰瑞的疑心很快就过去了,她试图探明是否杰克和金伯利是真的安然无恙.

sentences.en: The little information that we could glean about them was largely contradictory.
sentences.cn: 我们能够收集到的有关它们的少量信息大部分是自相矛盾的.

sentences.en: They gatherthe fields and glean the vineyards of the wicked.
sentences.cn: 收割别人田间的禾稼,摘取恶人余剩的葡萄.

trans.tran_en: to collect grain that has been left behind after the crops have been cut
